root.name: Breakfree
root.description: OverviewBreakfree, released in 1995 by Software Storm, Inc., is a first-person block-breaking game. The goal of the game is also its title--players must destroy the walls that surround them by bouncing projectiles into the walls. Like traditional block-breaking games, some blocks contain power-ups, and losing all of the projectiles means game over for the player.
